{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|1=
regex_traits();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Default-constructs the {{lc|std::regex_traits}} object, including default-constructing the private {{lc|std::locale}} member or any other internal state as necessary.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;

int main()
{
    std::locale::global(std::locale("en_US.utf8"));
    std::regex_traits&lt;char&gt; r1;
    std::regex_traits&lt;wchar_t&gt; r2;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "The regex locale is " &lt;&lt; r1.getloc().name() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
The regex locale is en_US.utf8
}}
